scandals , among them the ones at HUD , the same characteristics as Wedtech .

Ms . de Vries a writer .
Computer programming ( to programming or coding ) the process of writing , testing , and maintaining the source code of computer programs .
The source code is in a programming language .
This code may a modification of source or something .
The process of source code expertise in many subjects , including knowledge of the application domain and algorithms to the behavior .
Within software engineering , programming ( the implementation ) is phase in a software development process .
In some specialist applications or situations a program may be or ( patching ) by the values of the machine code instructions to be into memory .
There an debate on the extent to which the writing of programs an art , a craft or an engineering discipline . [1]
Another debate the extent to which the programming language in programs the form that the program .
This debate to that the Sapir Whorf hypothesis in linguistics .
Computer programmers those who computer software .
Their job : Requirements analysis , Specification , Software architecture , Coding , Compilation , Software testing , Documentation , Integration , Maintenance .
programming languages support styles of programming ( programming paradigms ) .
The choice of language may an individual 's choice or may be by company policy .
the programming language for the task will be .
Trade-offs from this ideal enough programmers , who the language , to a team , the availability of compilers for that language , and the efficiency with which programs in a language .
History of programming
The programmable machine ( that is , a machine that can its capabilities upon its " program " ) can be to the Jacquard Loom , which was in 1801 .
The machine a series of pasteboard cards with holes in them .
The hole pattern the pattern that the loom had to in cloth .
The loom could weaves sets of cards .
This innovation was by Herman Hollerith of IBM in the development of the IBM punch card .
These were with a variety of machines unit record equipment to data processing tasks .
The unit record equipment were by the wiring of plugboards .
computers programming methods .
The invention of the Von Neumann architecture programs to be in computer memory .
programs had to be the instructions of the machine , in notation .
Every model of computer would to instructions to the same task .
assembly languages were that the programmer each instruction in a text format , abbreviations for each operation code of a number and addresses in form ( e . g . ADD X , TOTAL ) .
In 1954 Fortran , the level programming language , was .
This programmers to calculations by a formula ( e . g . Y = X*2 + 5*X + 9 ) .
The program text , or source , was into machine instructions a program a compiler .
Many languages were , including ones for programming , such as COBOL .
Programs were punch cards or paper tape .
( computer programming in the punch card era ) .
In the mid-1970s , storage devices and computer terminals programs could be by typing into the computers .
Text editors were that changes and corrections to be much more than with punch cards .
As time has computers have leaps in the area of processing power .
This has programming languages that from the hardware .
Although these more languages overhead , in most cases the increase in speed of computers has little performance decrease to counterparts .
The benefits of these more languages that they both an learning curve for people less the lower-level programming languages , and they a more programmer to applications .
Despite these benefits , programs , and programs that more speed the and lower-level languages with todays hardware .
( The same concerns were about the Fortran language . )
Throughout the half of the century , programming an career in most countries .
Some forms of programming have to offshore outsourcing ( software and services from countries , at a wage ) , programming career decisions in countries more , while opportunities in less areas .
It is how this trend will and how it will programmer wages and opportunities .
Despite the " outsourcing trend " it can be that some of the persons on the globe programmers by profession .
Examples : Bill Gates ( Microsoft ) , Larry Ellison ( Oracle ) , Larry Page ( Google ) , Hasso Plattner ( SAP ) .
Programming a leading-edge craftsmanship that to its practitioners both in countries such as India and countries like the USA or Germany .
The step in every software development project should requirements analysis , by modeling , implementation and failure elimination ( debugging ) .
There of differing approaches for each of those tasks ; with the most modeling technique Object-Oriented Analysis and Design ( OOAD ) and Model-Driven Architecture ( MDA ) .
The Unified Modeling language ( UML ) a notation for OOAD .
A technique for database design Entity-Relationship Modeling ( ER Modeling ) .
Implementation techniques imperative languages ( object-oriented or ) , languages and logic languages .
Debugging is with IDEs like Visual Studio , and Eclipse .
debuggers like gdb are .
The most programming languages in the 21st century C , C++ , C sharp , Cobol , Fortran , Java , PHP and Python .
Many languages have from C , such as C++ , , and Java .
Java , and Python because programs in them are in a machine , many of the problems of lower-level languages such as C , C++ or Assembler , such as buffer overruns and pointers .
, most PC desktop applications such as word processors or image manipulation programs are in more runtime and memory languages like C , C++ , and Delphi .
Operating systems are in programming languages like C , C++ , or Assembler , since speed in components like context switching , process and thread management , and memory management .
applications are in Fortran because optimization ( optimizing Compilers ) for arithmetic .
Cobol in the data center , on Mainframe computers .
PHP and Java in database-oriented applications which are over the internet or intranets .
Python , while a programming language , is in system administration and web programming .
Debugging
Debugging a task for every programmer , because an program .
Languages like C++ and Assembler to programmers because of failure modes like Buffer overruns , pointers or uninitialized memory .
A buffer overrun can memory regions and a failure in a program line .
Because of those memory issues tools like Valgrind , Purify or Boundschecker a necessity for software development in the C++ language .
Languages such as Java , PHP and Python the programmer from most of these runtime failure modes , but this at the price of a execution speed of the program .
MASACCIO
It must have about the same time when Fra Angelico was the walls of San Marco with his angel pictures , that a kind of painter was in the Carmine church in Florence .
This no , monk , but an man of the world an , person , who , as long as he had pictures to , for .
Why , he would to for payment when his work was ; and as to of his clothes , or to himself , that a thing he !
What trouble his mother must have with him when he a boy !
It was no use him on an errand , he would it he had a hundred yards , and he and that it was to any one patience with him .
But him a pencil and a surface on which to , and he a boy .
It is that , in the town of Castello San Giovanni , some miles from Florence , where Tommaso was , there some figures to be , by him when he a boy .
there no carelessness and nothing about his work .
As the boy all his longings would towards Florence , the city where there everything to and to , and he was to a pupil in the studio of Masolino , a painter .
But though his drawings , his habits the same .
` There Tommaso the painter , ' the people would , the figure the streets on his way to .
` he but heed to his appearance .
but at his hair and the holes in his boots . '
` Ay , ! ' another would ;
` and it is if people him all they he would gold and to .
But what he so long as he his paints and brushes ?
`` Masaccio '' would a name for him than Tommaso . '
the name Masaccio , or Ugly Tom , to that by which the painter was .
But no one the meaning of the nickname , for Masaccio is as of the names in the history of Art .
This painter , of many things , with all his heart and soul for the work he had to .
It to him that painters had to their pictures like things .
The pictures they , not round as a figure should , and the feet did not as if they were on the ground , but as if they were in the air .
he with light and shadow and drawing until the figures he rounded of , and their feet were on the ground .
His models were from the youths whom he in the studio , but he them as no one had figures .
The buildings , , he to houses into the distance , and not like a picture .
He many frescoes both in Florence and Rome , this Ugly Tom , but at the time the people did not him much honour , for they him a fellow with his head in the clouds .
if he had fame and wealth would have to him , but he when he a young man , and a few how he .
But in after years , , all the artists would to that chapel of the Carmine to their lessons from those figures .
they would before the fresco which St . Peter a crowd of people .
And in that fresco they would all the figure of a boy who has out of the water , with cold , the most figure that had been up to that time .
All things must be , and each thing we a step .
this figure of the boy a step of the ladder of Art than any that had been .
And this would have the name of Masaccio to be upon the list of world 's painters .
